title: 5/30/17 - Kids, Terrorism, and Books?
description:
Was President Trump's European tour successful? ...Double standards of years gone by ...North Korea Threats: 'bigger gift package', 'brink of nuclear war' ...Dealing with bullies ...Making North Korea a 'sacrificial punching bag' ...Fun with #KidsTerrorismBooks ...Legitimate suffragette's ...Terrorism is a learned behavior due to the lack of education ...What Ramadan means to Doc's favorite Muslim? ...An extremely awkward conversation?...John Kasich vs. 2 Chainz ...Kanya and Kasich 2020 ...Death penalty for suicide bombers...Tempers flare over immigration crackdown in Texas...gun violence on the horizon? ...Revisiting the greatness of 'One Term Tom.

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
